DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Understanding well patient comply treatment regimen may help doctor determine best treatment ongoing care future patient . PURPOSE : This phase I study look compliance vaginal dilation therapy woman undergone radiation therapy stage IB , stage IIA , stage IIB , stage IIIA , stage IIIB cervical cancer stage IA , stage IB , stage IIA , stage IIB endometrial cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Compliance Vaginal Dilation Therapy Patients Who Have Undergone Radiation Therapy For Stage IB , Stage IIA , Stage IIB , Stage IIIA , Stage IIIB Cervical Cancer Stage IA , Stage IB , Stage IIA , Stage IIB Endometrial Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To determine adherence vaginal dilation therapy radiotherapy patient early-stage IB grade 2-IIIB cervical cancer stage IA grade 3-IIB endometrial cancer . - To identify demographic , medical , psychosocial factor associate adherence recommendation vaginal dilation patient . - To describe sexual , marital , non-marital dyadic functioning patient . OUTLINE : Patients IMPAC registry Radiation Oncology University Hospitals Case Medical Center , Ireland Cancer Center complete questionnaire online mail . Questionnaires include Vaginal Dilation Adherence questionnaire , Sexual Function-Vaginal Changes Questionnaire , Dyadic Satisfaction questionnaire , Physician/Nurse Recommendation Vaginal Dilation questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : History earlystage IB grade 2IIIB cervical cancer stage IA grade 3IIB endometrial cancer Meets follow criterion : Received radiotherapy disease Treated within last 3 year follow least 6 month PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Able read understand English Currently without sexual partner No history cancers No potentially lifethreatening disease PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
